revision.text: ==Turkish== {{was fwotd|tr|2018|April|18}} ===Etymology=== From {{inh|tr|ota|یقاموز}}, {{m|ota|یاقاموز|tr=yakamoz}}, from {{der|tr|el|διακαμός}}.<ref>[http://www.tdk.gov.tr/index.php?option=com_gts&kelime=YAKAMOZ Türk Dil Kurumu: Yakamoz]</ref> ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|tr|/jakaˈmoz/}} ===Noun=== {{tr-noun|u|lar}} # [[phosphorescence]] in the sea due to [[bioluminescent]] [[dinoflagellate]]s #* {{w|Mehmet Akif Ersoy}}: #*: '''Yakamozlar''' saçarak her tarafından fenerim / Çifte sandal, yüzüyorduk; o yüzer, ben yüzerim. #*:: '''Phosphorescence''' scattered all around is my lamp / We were swimming as a double rowboat: it swims, I swim. # the [[reflection]] of [[moonlight]] or other lights on [[water]] ====Declension==== {{tr-infl-noun-c|o|poss=1|pred=1}} ===References=== <references/>
